summary: Sprint 13: Content Calendar AI + Brain Prediction Challenge + Admin Role Fix - All 12 verification points PASSED. Backend 10/10 API tests passed. Frontend 10/10 features verified via Playwright.
passed_tests: 1. Admin login shows 'ForgeVoice Admin Dashboard' header - ✅ PASSED
2. Admin Overview KPIs: Total Clients (11), Videos Managed (79), Total Views (0), Active Channels (0) - ✅ PASSED
3. Admin sidebar hides Labs section (FVS System, Strategy Lab, AI Video Lab) - ✅ PASSED
4. Admin sidebar hides Blog nav - ✅ PASSED
5. Client login shows 'Welcome back, Chanakya Sutra' header - ✅ PASSED
6. Client sidebar shows Labs section and Blog - ✅ PASSED
7. Calendar page has 'AI Schedule' button visible in header - ✅ PASSED
8. AI Schedule button opens slide-over panel with 'Content Calendar AI' title - ✅ PASSED
8a. AI Schedule panel shows 'Your Best Performing Times' section - ✅ PASSED
8b. AI Schedule panel shows 'Generate 4-Week Schedule' button - ✅ PASSED
9. FVS System page shows 'Active Predictions' panel with 4 challenge cards - ✅ PASSED
9a. Challenge cards show 'Verdict in 30 days' with progress bar - ✅ PASSED
9b. Challenge cards show tier badges (High) - ✅ PASSED
10. Brain Accuracy panel visible at top of FVS System page - ✅ PASSED
11. Client Overview shows '4 active predictions awaiting verdict' link under Brain widget - ✅ PASSED
12. GET /api/calendar/best-times returns top posting slots with confidence levels - ✅ PASSED
13. GET /api/brain/active-challenges returns pending predictions with days_remaining - ✅ PASSED
14. GET /api/dashboard/admin-overview returns cross-channel summary stats - ✅ PASSED
15. Brain scores include days_remaining and is_expired fields - ✅ PASSED
16. Admin overview returns error for client users - ✅ PASSED
seed_data_creation: 4 brain_scores with 30-day challenge deadlines already exist for client demo-client-1.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sprint 13 complete. All Content Calendar AI features working: /api/calendar/best-times returns top posting slots, /api/calendar/ai-schedule generates/retrieves schedules. Brain Prediction Challenge features working: /api/brain/active-challenges returns pending predictions with days_remaining sorted by urgency. Admin Role Fix verified: admin sidebar hides Labs and Blog sections, admin-specific dashboard shows ForgeVoice Admin Dashboard header with cross-channel KPIs (Total Clients, Videos Managed, Total Views, Active Channels).

admin_role_fix.admin_kpis_cross_channel: PASSED - Shows Total Clients (11), Videos Managed (79), Total Views (0), Active Channels (0)
admin_role_fix.admin_sidebar_hides_labs: PASSED - Labs section (FVS System, Strategy Lab, AI Video Lab) hidden for admin
admin_role_fix.admin_sidebar_hides_blog: PASSED - Blog nav hidden for admin
admin_role_fix.client_sidebar_shows_labs: PASSED - Labs section and Blog visible for client

content_calendar_ai.ai_schedule_button: PASSED - 'AI Schedule' button visible in Calendar page header
content_calendar_ai.ai_schedule_slideover: PASSED - Opens slide-over with 'Content Calendar AI' title
content_calendar_ai.best_posting_times_section: PASSED - Shows 'Your Best Performing Times' with top 3 slots

brain_prediction_challenge.active_predictions_panel: PASSED - FVS System shows 'Active Predictions' panel with challenge cards
brain_prediction_challenge.challenge_cards_days_remaining: PASSED - Each card shows 'Verdict in 30 days'
brain_prediction_challenge.challenge_cards_tier_badges: PASSED - Each card shows tier badge (High)
brain_prediction_challenge.challenge_cards_progress_bar: PASSED - Progress bar showing time elapsed
brain_prediction_challenge.overview_challenges_link: PASSED - '4 active predictions awaiting verdict' link visible under Brain widget
brain_prediction_challenge.brain_scores_challenge_fields: PASSED - Brain scores include days_remaining and is_expired fields
